import React, {useState} from 'react' import ProjectNav from './ProjectNav' import {data} from './data' import {FiExternalLink} from 'react-icons/fi' const Projects = () => { const [dataItems, setDataItems] = useState(data) return (

Projects

{data.map((item) => { const {id, image, title, description, category, url} = item; return

{description}

{category}

})}
) } export default Projects
